Constant.desc: Parse recursively when iterating over directory
Constant.doc: Parse recursively when iterating over directory
Constant.name: parseRecursively

Method.desc: Generate chooser entries from python files in the path
Method.doc:
Generate chooser entries from python files in the path

Parameters:
path - the path to be parsed for .py files
HNukeLauncher:parseRecursively - An optional boolean for recursive parsing
Method.name: addDirectory
parameters: path - the path to be parsed for .py files
HNukeLauncher:parseRecursively - An optional boolean for recursive parsing

Method.desc: Add a hotkey to call the chooser menu
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: mapping - a table containing the shortcuts keys: {{"ctrl", "shift"}, "f"}

Variable.desc: How long the path should be in the subtext of the chooser 'users/x/path3/path2/path1/. Starts from the end'
Variable.doc: How long the path should be in the subtext of the chooser 'users/x/path3/path2/path1/. Starts from the end'
Variable.name: pathLenght

Variable.desc: Placeholder text for the chooser menu. Defaults to "Nuke scripts launcher"
Variable.doc: Placeholder text for the chooser menu. Defaults to "Nuke scripts launcher"
Variable.name: placeholderText

Variable.desc: Width of the chooser menu. Defaults to 20
Variable.doc: Width of the chooser menu. Defaults to 20
Variable.name: width

desc: Create a chooser menu with python files to be launched in Nuke app.
